name: Balls Of Chaos
description:
"Balls of Chaos” is an Arcade game that you challenge your sense of survival in a chaotic bullet-hell balls Arena. The game was made in 7 days for the Brackeys  2021.2 Game Jam with the theme being "Let There Be Chaos".

Be ALIVE until the CHAOS ends the game. You may be the winner who knows!

#P.s. By the way, you think you can handle the game? :) There is a SECRET mode on the game and an  ONLINE LEADERBOARD for the HARDCORE player that enjoys the Chaos and Submitting Their Records…let's see.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

Move - A and D / Arrow Keys (Pc and Linux Version)

Move - Holding A or D Visuals (Mobile Version)

Menu - Esc Button

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description: (Important)

In the “Balls of Chaos” you have 100 seconds that at the beginning of the game it starts to counts down. when the First balls(with Zero Value) hit the wall of the player it splits into two balls and the number of the balls grows +1 . one original(Mother) ball and the other balls. 

1. when the mother balls hit the wall of the player it splits into two balls(like before) and the value number of the balls grows +1 again.

2. when the non-original balls hit the wall of the players it grows JUST in the value of the balls(value numbers) +1.

3. there is a value number limit. (five)

4. when the players can defense the balls with their pad they get the Positive score as the value number of the balls.
